title: Nick Frost: Meet the Author
itunes:author: Apple
itunes:subtitle: Truths, Half Truths & Little White Lies
itunes:summary: Nick Frost discusses his new book Truths, Half Truths & Little White Lies. The story of his life warts-and-all, the memoir is funny but also dark, exhilarating and movingly honest. Hosted by Chris Hewitt at the Apple Store, Covent Garden in London.
